tutorial.title: ğŸ“ **Quick Tutorial**
tutorial.step1:
**Step 1:** ğŸ’° Check Collection Prices
Use `/price cryptopunks` to get floor price info
tutorial.step2:

help.title:
ğŸ¤– **NFT Bot Help**

Available commands:

commands./price [collection]: ğŸ’° Get floor price for any NFT collection
commands./rankings: ğŸ† View top NFT collections by volume
commands./alerts: ğŸ”” Manage your price alerts (up to 10)

help.usage:
ğŸ’¡ **Examples:**
â€¢ `/price cryptopunks` - Get CryptoPunks floor price
â€¢ `/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 50` - Set alert at 50 ETH
â€¢ `/rankings` - Browse top collections

price_help.title: ğŸ’° **Price Command Help**
price_help.description: Get real-time floor prices for any NFT collection.
examples: â€¢ `/price cryptopunks` - Get CryptoPunks floor price
â€¢ `/price bored ape yacht club` - Get BAYC floor price
â€¢ `/price azuki` - Get Azuki floor price
tips: â€¢ You can use full collection names or common abbreviations
â€¢ The bot will suggest similar collections if not found
â€¢ Results include 24h price change and volume data

rankings_help.title: ğŸ† **Rankings Command Help**
rankings_help.description: Browse top NFT collections ranked by various metrics.
examples: â€¢ `/rankings` - View top collections by volume
â€¢ `/rankings volume` - Sort by trading volume
â€¢ `/rankings price` - Sort by floor price
tips: â€¢ Use navigation buttons to browse through pages
â€¢ Click on any collection for detailed information

alerts_help.title: ğŸ”” **Alerts Command Help**
alerts_help.description: Set up to 10 price alerts for your favorite collections.
examples: â€¢ `/alerts add cryptopunks 100` - Alert when CryptoPunks hits 100 ETH
â€¢ `/alerts remove cryptopunks` - Remove CryptoPunks alert
â€¢ `/alerts list` - List all active alerts
tips: â€¢ You can have up to 10 active alerts
â€¢ Alerts trigger when floor price crosses your target
â€¢ Use `/alerts` to manage existing alerts

alerts.help:
ğŸ”” **NFT Price Alerts**

**Commands:**
`/alerts list` - View your active alerts
`/alerts add <collection> <price>` - Add price alert
`/alerts remove <id>` - Remove alert by ID

**Examples:**
`/alerts add cryptopunks 50` - Alert when CryptoPunks floor hits 50 ETH
`/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 30` - Alert for BAYC at 30 ETH

ğŸ’¡ *Alerts check prices every hour*
alerts.list_empty:
ğŸ“‹ **Your Active Alerts**

ğŸ”„ No active alerts found.

Use `/alerts add <collection> <price>` to create your first alert!

search.instructions: ğŸ” Search Collections To search for a specific NFT collection, simply type: /price [collection name] For example: â€¢ /price bored ape â€¢ /price cryptopunks â€¢ /price azuki The bot will find the collection and show you the current floor price and market data!
